data.title: Popular Film Actors from Mexico
data.meta_description: List of famous film actors and actresses from Mexico, listed by their popularity with photos when available. Mexico has given birth to some great movie actors ...
data.text:
List of famous film actors and actresses from Mexico, listed by their popularity with photos when available. Mexico has given birth to some great movie actors and actresses over the years, many of who have gone on to star in comedies, dramas, horror movies and more. These are some of the best Mexican screen actors in the history of the world, so if you're a native of Mexico and an aspiring actor/actress then these are people you should look up to.

The list you're viewing is made up of many different film actors, like Pilar Montenegro and Gustavo Aguilar.

This list answers the questions, "Who are the best Mexican actors?" and "Which movies stars are from Mexico?"

You can click on the names of these legendary movie stars of Mexico in order to get more information about each one. If you're a film buff use this list of talented Mexican film actors to find some new movies you haven't already seen.

Ranked by

Lawrence of Arabia, The Ox-Bow Incident, Last Action Hero

Birthplace : Chihuahua, Mexico

Nationality : United States of America, Mexico

Height : 6'0"

Parents : Francisco Quinn, Manuela Oaxaca

Children : Francesco Quinn, Danny Quinn, Alex A. Quinn, Lorenzo Quinn, Ryan Quinn

Born into a destitute family in Chihuahua, Mexico, Anthony Quinn defied all odds to become one of Hollywood's most notable actors of Mexican descent. Having appeared in over 150 feature films, he is best known for his riveting and unforgettable performance in Zorba the Greek, which not only earned him an Academy Award nomination for Best Actor but also solidified his status as a major international star. To this day, Quinn's remarkable acting skills continue to inspire countless artists aiming to break down barriers and achieve greatness on screen.

From Dusk till Dawn, Grown Ups, The Faculty

Birthplace : Mexico, Coatzacoalcos

Nationality : United States of America, Mexico

Height : 5'1"

Parents : Sami Hayek Dominguez, Diana Jiménez Medina

Children : Valentina Paloma Pinault

The stunningly beautiful Salma Hayek hails from the culturally rich and vibrant city of Veracruz, Mexico, and has captivated audiences with her fiery spirit and undeniable talent. Establishing herself as a prominent actress with her breakthrough role in Desperado, she went on to deliver a brilliantly nuanced portrayal of the iconic Mexican painter Frida Kahlo in the critically acclaimed biopic Frida, earning an Academy Award nomination for Best Actress. Hayek's extensive career, both in front of and behind the camera, has paved the way for future generations of Latina actresses looking to make their mark in Hollywood.

The Lion King, From Dusk till Dawn, Cars

Birthplace : Los Angeles, California, USA

Nationality : United States of America

Height : 5'6"

Parents : Elsa Meza, Oscar Marin

Born to a policeman father in Los Angeles, Cheech Marin proudly embraces his Mexican roots, having once described himself as a "Chicano born in East L.A." Best known for his outrageous comedic partnership with Tommy Chong in the duo Cheech & Chong, the pair created a series of successful films that incorporated their unique blend of counterculture humor with a distinctly Mexican-American flair. In addition to his work in film, Marin has contributed his voice talents to several animated movies and television shows, forever etching his name in the annals of entertainment history.

Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan, The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!, Escape from the Planet of the Apes

Birthplace : Torreon, Coahuila, Mexico

Nationality : Mexico

Height : 6'0"

Parents : Jenaro Montalbán, Ricarda Merino

Children : Laura Montalbán, Anita Montalbán, Mark Montalbán, Victor Montalbán

Hailing from the bustling metropolis of Mexico City, Ricardo Montalbán's debonair charm and magnetic screen presence made him an unforgettable actor in both American and Mexican cinema. Best known for his role as the enigmatic Mr. Roarke on the popular television series Fantasy Island, Montalbán also played the iconic villain Khan Noonien Singh in Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan. Truly a versatile actor, his career spanned over sixty years and included roles in both dramatic and comedic projects, earning him a place among the film industry's most respected talents.

Blade Runner, Stand and Deliver, Beverly Hills Chihuahua

Birthplace : Los Angeles, California, USA

Nationality : United States of America, Mexico

Height : 5'9"

Parents : Pedro Olmos, Eleanor Huizar

Children : Bodie Olmos, Michael D. Olmos, Mico Olmos, Brandon Olmos, Tamiko Olmos

Born in Los Angeles to Mexican immigrant parents, Edward James Olmos represents the embodiment of the American Dream through his numerous accomplishments in the world of entertainment. Perhaps most famous for his gripping, Academy Award-nominated portrayal of real-life math teacher Jaime Escalante in Stand and Deliver, Olmos has consistently chosen roles that explore themes of social justice, courage, and the human spirit. With a career encompassing both film and television, his enduring influence as an actor, director, and producer continues to break barriers and inspire change.

Ali, Jaws: The Revenge, New Jack City

Birthplace : Mexico City, Distrito Federal, Mexico

Nationality : United States of America, Mexico

Height : 5'10"

Parents : Melvin Van Peebles, Maria Marx

Children : Maya Van Peebles, Morgana Van Peebles, Mandela Van Peebles, Makaylo Van Peebles, Marley Van Peebles

Although born in Mexico City, Mario Van Peebles grew up in the United States, where he would ultimately forge a successful career as an actor, director, and producer. The son of groundbreaking filmmaker Melvin Van Peebles, Mario made a name for himself with starring roles in popular films such as New Jack City and Posse, while simultaneously working behind the camera to create thought-provoking movies that tackle issues of race, culture, and identity. Despite his diverse range of projects, Van Peebles' unique talent and dedication to his craft have remained constant fixtures throughout his illustrious career.
